description:
Gabe is 18, and just graduated from high school this spring.
"I was kind of the cool kid on campus," he said, describing his experience. "So everyone knew who I was."
For such a young guy, though, he seems to have a pretty good head on his shoulders.
He just started college and he already knows what he wants to do.
"I want to be in Human Physiology," he said. "So I'm going to go into either Sports Medicine or Orthotics."
He's not shy and once he agreed to meet us he didn't have a problem telling people he knew.
"Yeah, a couple of friends know," he explained. "And my dad knows, but not my mom."
Unusual, but it's cool that he has such a close relationship with his father!
"I just told my dad that I'm basically going to film porn," he said. "He was like, 'Hey if I could be a porn star I'd be one too, but I'm 50!'"
Another interesting thing about Gabe is that he says he's "a little bit bisexual."
When we asked him what kind of guys he likes he said: "Ummm, tan guys. Latin, Italian."
He doesn't have a lot of experience yet.
"I've only done something with another guy one time... and I definitely liked topping."
So they fucked!
The guy was someone he knew from school, and the encounter started off with a game of "you show me yours and I'll show you mine!"
"He started sucking me off first," Gabe said.
"Did you suck him off?"
"Yeah, I did."
"How did you like sucking a dick?"
"I was a little weird, but I still like a dick in my mouth for some reason."
"What's something you're looking forward to?"
"I've never had balls in my mouth, so maybe that..."
Cool!
title: Gabe
